entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 6. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries early this afternoon. Becoming sunny late this afternoon. Local blowing snow near noon. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 25 this morning and minus 14 this afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 14.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy late this evening. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 14 this evening and minus 21 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy in the morning with 60 percent chance of flurries late in the morning and in the afternoon. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning. High minus 2.
